messages.siteMetaData.title: Raj Doctors
messages.siteMetaData.description: Find Doctor's Chamber's Location, Time, Contact Information and Details.
messages.siteMetaData.tagLine: Online Hub of Doctors in Rajshahi
messages.aboutText: RajDoctors is an online platform to ease the pain of finding doctors. It is always painful to find out which doctor is perfect, where the chamber of his/her. This platform gives you - Easy but efficient way to find doctors - Doctor's chamber location, contact information - Category of doctors according to their specialty Have a Good day ! and Get well Soon!!!
messages.advantages .1: Easy but efficient way to find details of doctors
messages.advantages .3: Category of doctors according to their specialty
messages.notExist: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
